name: Defuser VR
description: Defuser VR is an easy to pickup bomb defusing game set against the clock...up to 18 of them!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 Processor: Intel Core i7 4790K Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Any
